thread.section_title: Home Zone Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Home Zone Furniture | homezonefurniture.com | 4 of 153
thread.title: Megan
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Megan

author: Megan
title: Megan
text: There were quite a few options to look at, furniture seemed to be mostly pretty good quality, and the marked prices were really good on most pieces. Staff was very friendly and relaxed, no pushy salespeople or hovering involved! The only negative thing I have to say is that the prices marked didn't match what the computer showed on a few things, so make sure you check that before purchasing! Overall one of my best furniture-buying experiences.
